snippet.title: Industrial Petting - Early Access Trailer [VR, HTC Vive, Valve Index]
snippet.description:
Early Access trailer for Industrial Petting, a multiplayer, cruelty-free factory-building game about making pets for the universe; featuring full virtual reality support. Developed by Another Yeti, available for HTC Vive and Valve Index. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/industrial-petting

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com

SUPPORT US
